name: Vouchers 4 Veggies - EatSF
description: This program was funded through the Department of Public Health, City and County of San Francisco and other supporters. EatSF helps low-income residents integrate more nutritious foods into their diets. The weekly vouchers are time limited. Encouraging users get in the habit of shopping regularly for produce at stores located in their own neighborhoods. The vouchers allow families their choice of healthy produce that fits with their culture and tastes. ALL VOUCHERS are distributed ONLY through c
